review_text: Great course. It met my expectations.

I am looking forward to applying everything I have learned to my blog.  I have been blogging for 4 years, and there is so much for me to learn!  I love the outline it allows for great notes and the added content calendar.
Excellent information

The course was good, I found the content helpful as a new freelancer. The first question in the second test listed the correct answer as the incorrect answer, and then it stated the correct answer which is what I picked.

Maddie provided clear and practical tips that can be implemented immediately! I would certainly recommend the course to anyone seeking to improve their writing skills. Thank you for the well thought out content and engaging delivery. ðŸ˜Š

Super helpful! Great ideas to generate more engaging and thoughtful content.  I have been writing blogs on the topic of real estate for the past 5 months and wanted to step up my game.  This course will do just that! Thank you!
Average
It was my first course with Fiverr and I m happy to say that it was top notch.
I loved this course for the quick essential tips that are easy to understand and start implementing right away.
Super easy to digest.  Great practical advice.
Really great course! Valuable material and insights from an experienced blogger. Concise and practical content. Thank you.

I thoroughly enjoyed this course and thought it was very well-structured, beautifully delivered, highly professional, informative, comprehensive and overall delightful to listen to.  Oh, and the styling of the video is like, award-winning level! 
Thanks so much, Maddy! 

:) Netta
Great course, very helpful on processes for making great blog posts.

This course helped me organize my content and provided me with helpful tips, tools, insight, strategies, and resources that I can't wait to implement. 

Maddie's calm nature made the content easy to digest, and I would definitely recommend this course to those seeking advice regarding improving their blog content and strategies.
This course is packed with valuable information and helpful tips. Thank you!
I really enjoyed this course! It was thoughtfully planned out and gave me the tools I need to begin writing blogs. It gave me the confidence and direction I was looking for.

I really enjoyed taking this course. The information is presented in a clear and concise way, making it easy and enjoyable to go through. In addition to this, the course is divided into short, bit-sized chunks of information, which means that it's easy to pause and start up at your convenience.

As a host, Maddie is a warm and engaging educator, whose vast experience in the subject makes the course particularly in-depth despite its length.

All in all, an excellent course. I'm very happy I took it.
This was really helpful for me to understand the material.  I really like the flow of the course as well as the short videos and quizzes.
Very informative but I wish it included a section on working with clients. How that would look and how to present yourself as a freelance writer and not just for your own blog.
This is a great course for those who are new or already familiar with writing. I enjoyed filling my notebook with helpful notes!
A great course from Maddie, very useful information for all experience levels. Give it a watch, it's well worth your time!

This course is informational and inspirational. Some of the info was a bit intuitive to me, but the course also provides some great tips, tools, and tricks. The host is pleasant and makes the info easy to digest.
Maddie does an excellent job of breaking down the steps necessary for developing, writing, and publishing blog content.
This is great if you are new to blogging, with many links and other resources you can use once the course has finished

Maddie Cohen knows well how to articulate and is an expert in blogging but for SEO purposes blogging is overrated. I do appreciate that she mentions the alt-tag, whose content is crucial for boosting keywords connected to a website's images. Regarding the content advice she gives here in this very good tutorial, I need some time to think about the new information and process everything for a valuable conclusion.
Excellent course, even for those who have been putting pen to paper for a little while already. Maddie knows her stuff and does a fantastic job with the delivery.
Great Course! Very useful!! Can be recommended..
The information was good, with no fluff!
This was a great introductory course for me!
A brief, yet helpful course that helped me fill in the blanks where I wasn't sure about things. Thanks!
A lot of valuable content that I am excited to apply to my own work!
The information was presented very well. I really enjoyed this class, Thanks Maddie!
Excellent job and great work. Thanks
